posts.title: 老牌日记软件 Day One 贵在哪里?
posts.text: Day One的3个版本对比: Premium, Plus vs Basic 🇨🇳APP Store🔗https://apps.apple.com/cn/app/day-one-%E6%97%A5%E8%AE%B0-%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0/id1044867788?uo=4&at=11l6hc&app=itunes&ct=fnd Basic Plus[^1] Premium 价格 免费 原DayOne2.0升级自动迁移 🇨🇳248年付🇨🇦46.99🇺🇸34.99 云同步 ❌ ✔️ ✔️ 端对端加密 ❌ ✔️ ✔️ 图片 (每篇文章) 1张 10张 30张 视频 (每篇文章) ❌ ❌ 5分钟(1080P) 语音记录 ❌ ❌ 5分钟可转录3小时普通录音 [^1]: 2017 年 6 月 29 日之前已购买过 Day One 的「老」用户 (包括限免时下载的) 参考资料: https://www.iplaysoft.com/dayone.html https://dayoneapp.com/ Post author: EricJPost link: https://www.dmcrse.com/zh-cn/Why-is-the-classic-diary-software-Day-One-expensive/Copyright Notice: All articles in this blog are licensed under BY-NC-SA unless stating additionally.
